title: Missouri
prompt: A weathered county road cutting through rolling Ozark hills at golden hour, lined with bare or sparse trees, with a small-town silhouette and church steeple visible on the distant horizon; in the immediate foreground, hands gripping a steering wheel or resting on a porch railing, suggesting the perspective of someone navigating rural Missouri's geography. Soft, diffused late-afternoon light casts long shadows across worn asphalt and red clay shoulders. The composition emphasizes distance and isolation while preserving dignityâ€”capturing the texture of rural persistence rather than rural struggle.
